## Functions

### collectCommonDebugInfo() {#a9d81a7f738bbf6c1cd81fdca9ba2bc99}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MetadataSetTy anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CoroSplit.cpp&#125;::collectCommonDebugInfo (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F)</>}>
Collect (a known) subset of global debug info metadata potentially used by the function <code>F</code>.

This metadata set can be used to avoid cloning debug info not owned by <code>F</code> and is shared among all potential clones <code>F</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/coroutines/corosplit-cpp/#l00087">87</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/coroutines/corosplit-cpp">CoroSplit.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
